description: The iRiver AFT 100 Mobile FM Transmitter lets you listen to your iRiver player and most other portable audio devices through your car stereo. All you have to do is plug the transmitter into one of your car's power sockets and the headphone jack of your player, sync frequencies with the stereo, then turn the volume up. You can pick whatever FM signal you choose, and this small transmitter with a big, stylish blue display needs no batteries.What's in the BoxAFT-100 mobile FM transmitter and instruction sheet.
title: iriver AFT 100 Mobile FM Transmitter
